mapper.select: select a.indocno,a.sfcode,a.sfname,a.iapprovalstate,a.ilineid ,a.iqty,a.seqclassno,a.idutyid,a.smajornm,,a.imanagedeptid,a.iuserid from am_dur_lv_cons_transfer_dt a where a.idel = 0 order by a.dregt desc
select a.* from am_dur_lv_cons_transfer_dt a where a.indocno = #{indocno} and a.idel = 0
select count(0) from am_dur_lv_cons_transfer_dt a where a.idel = 0
